description: AIA Insurance Lanka Ltd. Vs. Right to Information Commission and Others before Hon. S.U.B. Karalliyadde, J.
parties: AIA Insurance Lanka Ltd. Vs. Right to Information Commission and Others
keywords: Section 43(g) of the Right to Information Act, public authority, Lack of jurisdiction, alternative remedy
